name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: Fixed initialization timing - waits for DOM to be fully ready before setting up observers. Enhanced action sheet detection with proper logging. All naming consistent using xThemeSong.

Enhanced action sheet detection - now checks for existing action sheets on page load AND monitors for new ones. Fixed script route mismatch. Includes web folder for file system fallback. All naming consistent using xThemeSong.
Fixed critical route mismatch: Plugin.cs now correctly injects script from /xThemeSong/plugin. Includes web folder for file system fallback. All naming is now consistent using xThemeSong.
